reuters.title: CATHAY PACIFIC AIRWAYS LTD <CAPH.HK> YEAR 1986
reuters.body: Shr 46.5 H.K. Cents vs 29.3 Final div 14 cents, making 20 cents (no comparison) Net 1.23 billion dlrs vs 777.5 mln Turnover 9.06 billion dlrs vs 7.52 billion Note - Dividend payable May 29, books close May 11 to 22. Note - Company floated in April 1986 and is now 50.23 pct owned by Swire Pacific Ltd <SWPC.HK>, 16.43 pct by Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corp <HKBH.HK> and 12.5 pct by <China International Trust and Investment Corp>. REUTER 
